name: Mage Tower (itch)
description:
A simple RPG style mage tower game I created leveraging assets primarily from craftpix using construct 3.  Any feedback on the feel of the game is appreciated!  I am a hobbyist who enjoys tinkering when I find the time :)

One quirk to the game is that I decided when I started that the swipes should originate from the character... in a future version I will change so that the gestures work from anywhere on the screen.

Commands:

Tap: Fireball

Double Tap: Shield

Swipe Left / Right (Starting on character!): Big Fireball

Swipe Up (Starting on character!): Sun Strike

Swipe Down (Starting on Character!): Burning Floor

Hold (on Character!) and Aim: Tesla Ball

Goal is to climb as high as you can, games gets progressively harder.. not sure I have made it pass level 4 :)
